metadata.name: Into the Unknown
metadata.description:
Into the Unknown is a 3rd person adventure game created in Unreal Engine 5. 

You are a young girl, who finds herself in this hyperreal dystopian space standing in front of a maze. You have to navigate through many twists and turns to find a way out to the other side. 

The artwork is a metaphor on life itself. There are many levels and multitudes of paths to take. And to get to the next level, we must embark on a journey and plunge into the unknown. Standing still might seem safe, but inaction is a dead end. We must always find a way forward, even if our destination is not yet visible. 

This NFT comes with the game file.
